E8_1.name: Application Control
E8_1.description: Application control implemented to prevent execution of unapproved/malicious applications

maturity_levels.ML2: Application control implemented on workstations and servers
maturity_levels.ML3: Application control implemented using cryptographic signatures

E8_2.name: Patch Applications
E8_2.description: Security vulnerabilities in applications patched, updated or mitigated within 48 hours

maturity_levels.ML1: Security vulnerabilities in applications patched within one month
maturity_levels.ML2: Security vulnerabilities in applications patched within two weeks
maturity_levels.ML3: Security vulnerabilities in applications patched within 48 hours

E8_3.name: Configure Microsoft Office Macro Settings
E8_3.description: Microsoft Office macros blocked for users that do not have a demonstrated business need

maturity_levels.ML1: Microsoft Office macros disabled in internet zone
maturity_levels.ML2: Microsoft Office macros disabled except in trusted locations
maturity_levels.ML3: Microsoft Office macros disabled and blocked from the internet

E8_4.name: User Application Hardening
E8_4.description: Web browsers hardened and unnecessary features disabled

maturity_levels.ML1: Web browsers configured to block Flash content, ads and Java
maturity_levels.ML2: Web browsers configured to block Flash, ads, Java and web browser extensions
maturity_levels.ML3: Web browsers configured to block or sandbox active content including Flash, ads, Java and web browser extensions

maturity_levels.ML1: Privileged users use separate privileged and unprivileged operating environments
maturity_levels.ML2: Privileged users use separate privileged and unprivileged operating environments that are different operating systems
maturity_levels.ML3: Privileged users use separate privileged and unprivileged operating environments that are different operating systems and validated

E8_6.name: Multi-factor Authentication
E8_6.description: Multi-factor authentication used to restrict access and authenticate users

maturity_levels.ML1: Multi-factor authentication used by privileged users
maturity_levels.ML2: Multi-factor authentication used by all users of important data repositories
maturity_levels.ML3: Multi-factor authentication used by all users and when authenticating to important data repositories from other systems

E8_7.name: Regular Backups
E8_7.description: Backups of data, software and configuration settings regularly performed and tested

maturity_levels.ML1: Daily backups of important data, software and configuration settings stored offline, online or in the cloud
maturity_levels.ML2: Daily backups of important data, software and configuration settings stored offline and online or in the cloud
maturity_levels.ML3: Daily backups of important data, software and configuration settings stored offline, online and in the cloud with restoration tested quarterly

E8_8.name: Monitor and Analyse Activities
E8_8.description: Event logs centrally stored and monitored for signs of compromise

maturity_levels.ML1: Event logs stored centrally and protected from unauthorised modification and deletion
maturity_levels.ML2: Event logs stored centrally, protected from unauthorised modification and deletion, and monitored for signs of compromise
maturity_levels.ML3: Event logs stored centrally, protected from unauthorised modification and deletion, and monitored in real time for signs of compromise

ML1.name: Essential Eight Maturity Level One Profile

controls.name: Application Control - ML1
controls.implementation: Block unapproved software on user workstations
controls.validation: Verify application control policies prevent unapproved execution

controls.name: Patch Applications - ML1
controls.requirement: Security vulnerabilities patched within one month
controls.implementation: Establish monthly patching cycle for applications
controls.validation: Verify critical vulnerabilities patched within 30 days

controls.name: Multi-factor Authentication - ML1
controls.validation: Verify all privileged access requires MFA

ML2.name: Essential Eight Maturity Level Two Profile

controls.name: Application Control - ML2
controls.requirement: Application control on workstations and servers
controls.implementation: Extend application control to server infrastructure
controls.validation: Verify application control across all systems

controls.name: Patch Applications - ML2
controls.requirement: Security vulnerabilities patched within two weeks
controls.validation: Verify critical vulnerabilities patched within 14 days

ML3.name: Essential Eight Maturity Level Three Profile

controls.name: Application Control - ML3
controls.validation: Verify cryptographic validation of all applications
